qas.question: In what two rare cases were local governments able to mitigate the impact of of European colonization through treaties?
What did Ethiopians learn in order to use treaties to prevent a European power from overstepping their agreement?

answers.text: the intricacies of European diplomatic customs

qas.question: Both Ethiopia and Qing Dynasty China learned the intricacies of European diplomatic customs to mitigate what through treaties?
In addition to preventing a power from overstepping their agreement, how was Ethiopia able to mitigate the impact of European colonization?

answers.text: by playing different powers against each other

qas.question: Ethiopia and Qing Dynasty China were both able to prevent European powers from doing what to their agreements?

context: In some rare cases, such as with <a0_0>Ethiopia and Qing Dynasty China<a0_0/>, the local governments were able to use the treaties to at least mitigate <a2_0>the impact of European colonization<a2_0/>. This involved learning <a1_0>the intricacies of European diplomatic customs<a1_0/> and then using the treaties to prevent a power from <a4_0>overstepping<a4_0/> their agreement or <a3_0>by playing different powers against each other<a3_0/>.
